featuredArticle.title: AI Cancer Detection System Identifies Tumors 5 Years Before Symptoms
featuredArticle.excerpt: A groundbreaking AI system developed by Google Health can now detect cancer up to five years before symptoms appear. Clinical trials show 94% accuracy in early detection, potentially saving millions of lives through early intervention.

rightArticles.title: Live: Universal Flu Vaccine Shows 95% Efficacy in Final Trials
